thread.title: Serena Williams is jealous of sister Venus in Snapchats
thread.title_full: Serena Williams is jealous of sister Venus in Snapchats | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.com
title: Serena Williams is jealous of sister Venus in Snapchats
text:
Sibling rivalry between these two tennis pros is par for the course, but looks like they fight about more than just whether the ball was in or out.
While her muscular thighs have been celebrated in magazines and immortalized in rap versus, Serena Williams revealed she would not mind have sister Venus' slender figure.
The 35-year-old champion spent most of her Wednesday morning being envious of her sibling and making fun of her simultaneously on Snapchat .
Scroll down for video
Grass is greener? Serena Williams playfully revealed on Wednesday that she is 'jealous' of her sister Venus' slender figure
Sibling revelry: The 35-year-old champion spent most of her Wednesday morning being envious of her sibling and making fun of her simultaneously on Snapchat
Serena covertly filmed her older sibling as she got ready for the day putting on a rare pair of pants.
As she filmed Venus without her knowledge, Serena remarked: 'She's so thin and I hate her.'
Ribbing her sibling as she put in tan colored tight pants, Serena joked: 'Do you need a belt?'
The tennis ace even went as far as drawing big red lines on her sister's thighs to make them look thicker.
Captured on film: Serena covertly filmed her older sibling as she got ready for the day putting on a rare pair of pants
Venus is clearly very proud of her legs as she rarely wears pants - something her little sis was all too happy to point out.
'So Venus how does it feel to wear pants?' Serena joked, 'They're low riders but still how does it feel to wear pants?'
Using Snap filters and speaking to the camera while waiting for her sister to get in the car, Serena continued making jokes at her sibling's expense.
Jokes for days: Ribbing her sibling as she put in tan colored tight pants, Serena joked, 'Do you need a belt?'
'Trying to make her bigger lol': The tennis ace even went as far as drawing big red lines on her sister's thighs to make them look thicker
'I haven't seen her wear pants in years, ' Serena said, pretending to cry, 'I'm just so happy to know that she can wear pants.
'Yasss I'm petty, but I know she never wears pants and I know I'm going come in and dance better than her and leave.'
Despite being envious of her sister's shape, Serena is also very proud of her own.
'I'm just so happy to know that she can wear pants': Venus (pictured August) is clearly very proud of her legs as she rarely wears pants, something her sis was all too happy to point out
The tennis champion told Fitness she loved her shape in a 2014 interview: 'When I was young I thought I should be built more like an athlete - long and lean - not with a womanly figure.
'But then people my age started coming up to me and saying, ''I love you because of the way you look.'' That was really motivating. 'So I learned to be proud of my curves and embrace my large boobs. It's all about loving who you are and realizing that you're beautiful.'
Serena also can take solace in the fact she has more tennis titles under her belt with the latest being the Australian Open last month where she beat her sister 6-4, 6-4 victory.
Body positive: Despite being envious of her sister's shape, Serena (pictured last month) is also very proud of her own
Thick thighs win titles: Serena also can take solace in the fact she has more tennis titles under her belt with the latest being the Australian Open last month
Out of the 28 times they have gone head to head, Serena has won 17 while Venus has won 11.
The younger of the pair also currently ranked number one in the world while Venus - who was the first to turn professional - is number 11.
They do not like facing off against each however, with Serena previously saying, 'It definitely doesn't get easier.'
Still love each other: Out of the 28 times they have gone head to head, Serena has won 17 while Venus has won 11
